tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a root canal done when I was 14years old and since they do not put cap at that age, the dentist then told me to get it done after 10years. I wasn't much aware then so after 11 years the filling started breaking and causing pain. So I went to Dr Shilpa after seeing good reviews. She explained the problem well and told me I have 2 options, either to put a temporary cap followed by a permanent cap or to do a reroot canal to make sure no infection is there. I opted for the reroot canal followed by cap placement (zirconia) which took 4 sittings and the last sitting she explained that 3 teeth need tooth filling and did a dental cleaning for free. All over I am happy about the procedure done. It has been more than a week since I put the cap and it's not caused any problems. Dr Shilpa has also told me to be free to come to her anytime I have problems with the cap.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
